nodes.text: "R2-D2 - A Pilot's Best Friend" is the twenty-third episode of Star Wars Galaxy of Adventures. It premiered on the StarWarsKids.com website on April 12, 2019.

The video opens with Rebel Alliance starfighter pilots and their astromech droids scrambling into a hangar where their starfighters are stationed. The narrator explains that in a "galaxy of adventures," a pilot can always rely on their trusty astromech droids.

R2-D2 greets Luke Skywalker before being loaded into the astromech socket of a T-65B X-wing starfighter. Other rebel pilots and their astromech droids climb aboard their ships. Luke and R2-D2 fly their starfighters through a hyperspace wormhole and exit in the middle of a space battle.

During the battle, Luke's X-wing's laser cannons go offline. Luke gets R2-D2 to check if he can lock it down. R2-D2 descends inside the X-wing and repairs the ship's circuits and systems. With the ship's cannons restored, Skywalker is able to shoot down and destroy several TIE fighters.
